attributes.action: Euro Referendum was misleading - we call on the PM declare a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: Leading protagonist for exiting the EU made promises that he could not fulfill as confirmed by post referendum information.
attributes.background: Because of the deceit used to blind the UK populace to the dangers of exiting the EU we call on Parliament to be dissolved and that a General Election be called before any final decision to leave the EU is ratified by Parliament.

rejection.details:
An early General Election can only be triggered by the House of Commons, where criteria set out in the Fixed-term Parliaments Act 2011 are met.

The following petition calls for an early General Election in light of the EU referendum result:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133548
